document.full_text: gulf arab countries have stepped up their push for yemen's president ali abdullah saleh to hand over power, pressuring him and opposition representatives to meet to negotiate an orderly transition.
document.title: gulf states push for yemen's saleh to leave
lines_and_colors: gulf arab countries have stepped up their push for yemen's president ali abdullah saleh to hand over power, pressuring him and opposition representatives to meet to negotiate an orderly transition.
